content.rendered:
Foam Core Signs

Las Vegas Foam core signs (also known as foam board signs, and poster board signs) by Posterhead are vinyl signs mounted on a 3/16″ or 1/2″ foam board for rigidity. These foam board signs are excellent displays for business presentations, conventions / tradeshows, and special events. These foam core signs are made for indoor use and can have a laminate placed over the foam core board for a extra professional look. The most common sizes for the foam core boards are 3/16 and the 1/2″ size. However, thicker foam core boards are available upon request. Las Vegas casinos use these thicker type foam core boards as stand ups in the casino to direct people to certain areas of the casino or product attention.

In addition to the above mentioned uses, foam core boards, foam board and poster board signs are very popular at convenience stores in the Las Vegas area. These foam core signs make for wonderful impulse advertising at the check out counter. The convenience stores place these foam board signs very prominently at the checkout counters in hopes of persuading you to buy those impulse items that they are advertising. In addition, foam core boards are becoming increasingly popular at take out restaurants in the Las Vegas area. These foam board signs are lightweight and can be used for menu boards and hung over the cash register to assist people in making the proper selection. Many times, pictures of the food products are added next to the description to as sit in tempting you to purchase.

Posterhead Signs can help you create that perfect foam core board sign or can print off your print ready file.

Foam core signs are priced at $5.00/sqft for 3/16″ thickness, and $9.00/sqft for 1/2″ thickness. 

If you need a size not listed, just ask!
Contact us for additional specials
